Clinton: To be a Marine technician in the
Navy you must be:

423.text:
- 17 years or older
- medically fit for service

425.text:
- of good character
- a New Zealand citizen

428.text:
- and have completed at least three years
at secondary school.

431.text:
• Upon enlistment you will complete a 13
week basic military training course.

435.text:

• Training is concluded in the first four

440.text: years of a Marine Technician’s career.
